about-1:
Hi, I'm a german speaking Frontend Developer based near Rostock.
 Motivated by the limitless opportunities within IT, I am excited about crafting visually captivating and intuitive websites and applications.
about-l-1: I am open-minded and always looking for personal challenges to constantly improve my knowledge and skills.
about-l-2: In my profession, programming isn't just about writing code; it's a creative form of problem-solving. I take pride in my ability to distill complex technical challenges into simple, user-friendly solutions. This way, I help you achieve your goals and bring your visions to life.
skills-1: My journey has involved working on diverse projects, employing a range of frontend technologies and concepts. I am open to embracing new technologies and methodologies to continously enhance my skills and stay ahead in the ever-evolving landscape of web development.
skills-invite: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.
portfolio-1: Explore a selection of my work here - interact with projects to see my skills in action
Contact-main: Contact me through this form. I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
Read-privacy-2: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
